details.title: Smoothing joint integrated probabilistic data association

kwd: smoothing joint integrated probabilistic data association

authors.affiliation: Agency for Defense Development, Republic of Korea
authors.name: Chul Mok Lee

details.abstract: The authors extend the smoothing integrated probabilistic data association algorithm to multi-target tracking in clutter, or alternatively, use smoothing to improve the joint integrated probabilistic data association (JIPDA) algorithm. The predictions of forward and backward JIPDA are fused to form the smoothing prediction, which is used for smoothing multi-target data association.
